featured_articles.title: US markets rally as inflation cools faster than expected
featured_articles.summary: Major US indices jumped after the latest CPI report showed inflation easing, bolstering hopes for a soft landing.
content: Stocks climbed worldwide after new CPI figures showed headline inflation dipping below 3% for the first time in two years.
Investors now price in two rate cuts before year-end, while analysts warn that energy and wage pressures could still surprise.
Economists recommend diversified portfolios as central banks weigh slower growth against sticky service-sector prices.

featured_articles.title: Spain books Euro 2028 spot after decisive win over Italy
featured_articles.summary: La Roja kept a perfect qualifying run with a 3-1 victory, sealing an early ticket to the continental showpiece.
content: Midfielder Pedri pulled the strings with two assists, while Álvaro Morata netted a brace to silence a lively San Siro crowd.
Coach Luis de la Fuente praised his side's pressing intensity and hinted that several U-21 standouts could join the senior squad in 2026.
Italy will need results elsewhere to go their way after slipping to third in Group A with one matchday remaining.

featured_articles.title: Quantum startup claims breakthrough in error correction
featured_articles.summary: Seoul-based QubitWave says its new approach halves error rates, pushing quantum computing closer to practical workloads.
content: QubitWave's prototype chip uses a lattice of photonic qubits with adaptive machine-learning stabilisers to curb decoherence.
Industry observers say the approach could accelerate finance and pharmaceutical simulations, though large-scale deployment remains years away.
The startup plans to open-source its control stack next quarter to attract academic collaboration.
